dialogues.label: Welcome
notes: Hello everyone, I'm Tony, I'll be your guide on your adventure !
Get ready for the tutorial.
Story mode is a mode where you have to perform specific tasks to complete the level.
Click New game to start story mode.
Challenge mode is a ranking mode where you will have the opportunity to compete with other players.
Click challenge to start challenge mode.

dialogues.label: BeforeStartLevel
notes: The reward for completing the level is gold or items.
Successfully completing the level will receive more rewards.
You can only receive the reward once per level
Successfully completing the level will receive more rewards.
For each level, you can carry up to 3 items.

dialogues.label: Gold
notes: Gold is used to buy items or skins.
Gold can be earned by completing levels or purchasing in the store.

notes: Energy is used to summon animals.
Energy is produced by flowers.

dialogues.label: AnimalsNote
notes: Animals are the creatures you will have to summon to protect your jungle

notes: Inventory is where you can see the items you have.
